reviewText: I ended up purchasing this video after seeing some sequences on a free video that I had gotten as a free gift from a subscription. There are pretty much 3 really good scenes out of the 8 or 9. I also got it because there are a few names from the internet that a lot of people might recognize. Lisa Boyle who has an interesting encounter with a movie director behind the stage; Julie Strain (I've seen her in a few things) gets a little over excited at a theatre; in addition to Lisa Marie Scott and Anna-Marie Goddard. These scenes are all good however the real gem is at the end. A western encounter between the named star, Shauna O'Brien and the unmentioned Sara St. James who is popular around the internet and elsewhere. I won't spoil it for any prospective buyers but I will say that it is really hot. Run time is roughly 1 hour which is the norm but seems just right for this picture. Not a bad buy at all.

That video was a great surprise to me. It begins strongly with the energic Lisa Boyle. Wow! What a fabulous woman it is. She is easily one of the five sexiest playmates ever. Ihave watch this part of the video tons of times. It is just too great. Anna-Marie Goddard is wonderful too. She is so much sensual in this, that she turns the ice in hot water. I have a collection of Playboy videos, and this one remains one of my favorites. If you don`t like the music of the last part of the video, try this : play the main theme of the movie 1492 Conquest of Paradise while watching the video. The music have exactly the same running time than the video. It gives power to the pictures.
